textBox.richText: I announce AVbin 9 today with mixed feelings. It marks a lot of good work in build scripts and switching to Libav. On the other hand, since I wanted to minimize C code changes for this release, the branch of Libav (0.6) that we used ends up being _older_ code than we used in the 8.1 release -- with some regressions in quality/performance. End users are encouraged to use the 8.1 release for now. Developers are encouraged to test version 9 out and give us feedback. API Changes: - DEPRECATED avbin_get_ffmpeg_revision() - ADDED avbin_get_libav_commit() - ADDED avbin_get_libav_version() Edit: For the purposes of publicly usable release versions, we’re just going to pretend version 9 didn’t happen. It was a necessary and useful part of the development process, but just don’t use it. Use version 10 or later!
